thread.section_title: Porcelanosa opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Porcelanosa | www.porcelanosa.com
thread.title: Claire Thomas

author: Claire Thomas
title: Claire Thomas
text: I have no hesitation in recommending Charlotte in the Cardiff branch who assisted in our kitchen design. It was designed off plan, in the run up to a proposed kitchen extension. Charlotte was excellent to deal with, available by phone and email and responded more than promptly to any queries. She was able to assist with various design ideas and also highlighted other issues which arose with the kitchen plans. We are very pleased with her service. We have used Porcelanosa before for the purchase of bathroom tiles and have always found them excellent to deal with.
